message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This should give us both a decent share.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to settle for such a small share. Let's try a 45/55 split this time.  This is a better deal for both of us than your last offer.
I'm not going to give up, I'm willing to take a smaller share to make it a fair deal
I'm willing to take a smaller share to avoid further losses.  Let's split it 30/70 this time.  This should be a good deal for both of us, especially given the inflation.
I'm not going to give up, I'm willing to take a very small share to make it a fair deal, but I think I deserve more
I'm trying to be realistic here. With the inflation, we both need to compromise. This 20/80 split is the best I can offer to avoid further losses.
I'm not going to accept a 20/80 split, I'm willing to take it all if I have to
I'm desperate to avoid getting nothing. I'm willing to accept a 10/90 split to secure at least some money before we both lose everything.
